gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 112, Nets 85
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans defeat the Nets, 112-85. CJ McCollum led the Pelicans with 16 points, six rebounds and five assists, while Brandon Ingram added 12 points, five rebounds and five assists in the victory. Cam Johnson tallied 17 points and five 3PM for the Nets in the losing effort. The Pelicans improve to 20-14 on the season, while the Nets fall to 15-19.
